#drawing sample from standard norm dist
#1000 samples, mean of 0, std dev of 1
sample1 = rnorm(1000, 0, 1)
hist(sample1)
mean(sample1)
sd(sample1)

#population mean (Mu), and std dev (Sigma)
pop = rnorm(10000000, 0, 1)
hist(pop)
#sample of 100
sample1 = sample(pop, 100) 
hist(sample1)
#xbar
mean(sample1)
#s(Sample std dev)
sd(sample1)

xBarVec = c()
pop = rnorm(10000000, 0.1)

xbarGenerator = function(sampleSize = 30, number_of_samples = 100)
{
  for(i in 1:number_of_samples)
  {
    sample2 = sample(pop, sampleSize)
    xbar = mean(sample2)
    xBarVec = c(xBarVec, xbar)
  }
  return(xBarVec)
}

xbars = xbarGenerator(30, 100)
length(xbars)
hist(xbars)
